description:
GroupDocs.Viewer for .NET is a flexible library that enables you to display documents and images of more than 45 file formats from within your web & mobile applications. The library is 100% independent and doesn't require any 3rd-party software installation. This allows end users to, for example, view PDF documents from within your .NET applications without having to install Adobe Reader.

With GroupDocs' document viewer for .NET, your app's users can view documents and images of the following file formats:

 - Portable Document Format: PDF
 - Microsoft Word: DOC, DOCX, DOCM, DOT, DOTX, DOTM
 - Microsoft Excel: XLS, XLSX, XLSM, XLSB, XML
 - Microsoft PowerPoint: PPT, PPTX
 - Microsoft Visio: VSD, VDX, VSS, VSX, VST, VTX, VSDX, VDW
 - Microsoft Project: MPP, MPT
 - Microsoft Outlook: MSG, EML
 - OpenDocument Formats: ODT, OTT, ODS, ODP
 - Rich Text Format: RTF
 - Plain Text File: TXT
 - Comma-Separated Values: CSV
 - HyperText Markup Language: HTM, HTML, MHT, MHTML
 - XML Paper Specification: XPS
 - AutoCAD Drawing File Format: DXF
 - Image files: BMP, GIF, JPG, PNG, TIFF
 - Electronic publication: EPUB

Documents can be both rasterized and converted to SVG+HTML+CSS, delivering high-fidelity native text rendering.

GroupDocs.Viewer for .NET comes with a convenient UI, which allows users to easily navigate documents when viewing them. For instance, users can scroll multi-page documents, turn pages with the Go Forward/Backward buttons, jump straight to a specified page, search for text within the document using keywords, preview pages with thumbnails, zoom, print and download documents right from a web-browser.

For more details on the GroupDocs.Viewer for .NET Library, please visit our website: 
http://groupdocs.com/dot-net/document-viewer-library

Note: this download contains a fully working version of the product, however without a license set it will run in evaluation mode with some limitations. To test GroupDocs' document viewer for .NET library without evaluation limitations, request a free 30-day temporary license.
releaseNotes:
We are pleased to share a new version of GroupDocs.Viewer for .NET, with the following improvements
Bugs Fixed
WEB-1052	Squares are shown between lines in PDF files when using the HTML-based engine
WEB-1066	Text is overlapped when viewing a PDF file in the HTML-based mode
WEB-1103	Viewer.NET - Page content is displayed incorrect for particular PDF file is use Html-based ingine
WEB-1109	Viewer.NET - Extra boxes are displayed for particular PDF file with Html-based engine
WEB-1110	Viewer.NET - White spaces are missed for particular PDF file for Html-based engine
WEB-1124	NullReferenceException when opening 2 PDF documents
WEB-1125	IndexOutOfRangeException when opening 2 PDF files by the HTML-engine
WEB-1133	No spaces between words when opening a PDF document with the HTML engine
WEB-1190	The generation of the page image cache does not improve the speed of printing
WEB-1216	ArgumentOutOfRangeException: "Index and length must refer to a location within the string." when getting text coordinates in an Arabic document
WEB-1218	A PDF document of 851 pages is shown incorrectly by the HTML-based engine
WEB-1220	An unexpected font parsing exception when opening a PPTX file
WEB-1222	Aspose.Words 14.12: Conversion of big Word files to HTML page by page is 100 times slower than in 14.8
WEB-1223	Displaced text when viewing a PDF file
WEB-1224	An image is upside down when viewing a PDF document in HTML mode
WEB-1268	The Streams parameter with one element throws NullReferenceException
WEB-1298	The DocumentCache constructor for local storages throws an exception when rootStoragePath is null
WEB-1304	The page layout is not switching if one page in a row was initially set.
WEB-1322	The email address of addressee is not shown, only the name is shown, when the name is present in the mail message
Improvements
WEB-1300	Include the XML documentation file into the installers to enable Intellisense in Visual Studio
New Features
WEB-1116	Add support for reading and jumping to a content control in a Word document
WEB-1134	Use virtual scrolling to avoid significant browser reflows
WEB-1141	Printing and downloading a PDF version of a document with watermarks
WEB-1191	A layout showing two pages side by side
WEB-1219	Italian localization
WEB-1306	An option for embedding images into HTML for Word files for the HTML engine
summary: GroupDocs.Viewer for .NET is a flexible library that enables you to display documents and images of more than 45 file formats from within your web and mobile applications. The library is 100% independent and doesn't require any 3rd-party software installation.
title: GroupDocs.Viewer for .NET
